word:
The Lord Calls for Many.--The new year is just before us, and plans should be laid for earnest, persevering effort in the Master's service. There is much to be done to advance the work of God. I have been instructed that the canvassing work is to be revived, and that it is to be carried forward with increasing success. It is the Lord's work, and a blessing will attend those who 
                                                                           18
engage in it with earnestness and diligence.--Review and Herald, Jan. 20, 1903.
